1.text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

2.text: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judah and his brethren;

3.text: and Judah begat Perez and Zerah of Tamar; and Perez begat Hezron; and Hezron begat Ram;

4.text: and Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon; and Nahshon begat Salmon;

5.text: and Salmon begat Boaz of Rahab; and Boaz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;

6.text: and Jesse begat David the king. And David begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Uriah;

7.text: and Solomon begat Rehoboam; and Rehoboam begat Abijah; and Abijah begat Asa;

8.text: and Asa begat Jehoshaphat; and Jehoshaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Uzziah;

9.text: and Uzziah begat Jotham; and Jotham begat Ahaz; and Ahaz begat Hezekiah;

10.text: and Hezekiah begat Manasseh; and Manasseh begat Amon; and Amon begat Josiah;

11.text: and Josiah begat Jechoniah and his brethren, at the time of the carrying away to Babylon.

12.text: And after the carrying away to Babylon, Jechoniah begat Shealtiel; and Shealtiel begat Zerubbabel;

13.text: and Zerubbabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;

14.text: and Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

15.text: and Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

16.text: and Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

17.text: So all the generations from Abraham unto David are fourteen generations; and from David unto the carrying away to Babylon fourteen generations; and from the carrying away to Babylon unto the Christ fourteen generations.

18.text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When his mother Mary had been betrothed to Joseph, before they came together she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

19.text: And Joseph her husband, being a righteous man, and not willing to make her a public example, was minded to put her away privily.

20.text: But when he thought on these things, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

21.text: And she shall bring forth a son; and thou shalt call his name JESUS; for it is he that shall save his people from their sins.

22.text: Now all this is come to pass, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the Lord through the prophet, saying,

23.text: Behold, the virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, And they shall call his name Immanuel; which is, being interpreted, God with us.

24.text: And Joseph arose from his sleep, and did as the angel of the Lord commanded him, and took unto him his wife;

25.text: and knew her not till she had brought forth a son: and he called his name JESUS.
